SELECT oso.sales_user_name 'salesUserName',bs.region_name 'regionName',bs.country_name 'countryName',bs.supplier_id 'supplierId',bs.supplier_name 'supplierName', bmt.brand_name 'brandName',bmt.product_category 'productCategory',bpm.product_model_code 'productModelCode',bm.material_id 'materialId',bm.material_code 'materialCode', bm.material_desc 'materialDesc',count(*) 'qty',mspcd.create_time 'inDate' FROM mes_sfc_product_carton_det mspcd LEFT JOIN mes_sfc_work_order_barcode mswob ON mspcd.work_order_barcode_id = mswob.work_order_barcode_id LEFT JOIN mes_pm_work_order mpwo ON mswob.work_order_id = mpwo.work_order_id LEFT JOIN om_sales_order oso ON mpwo.sales_order_id = oso.sales_order_id LEFT JOIN base_supplier bs ON oso.supplier_id = bs.supplier_id LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON mpwo.material_id = bm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_material_tab bmt ON bm.material_id = bmt.material_id LEFT JOIN base_product_model bpm ON bmt.product_model_id = bpm.product_model_id
and DATE_FORMAT(mspcd.create_time,'%y%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%y%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%y%m')
and DATE_FORMAT(mspcd.create_time,'%y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%y%m')
AND mspcd.org_id=#{orgId}
and oso.sales_user_name like CONCAT('%',#{salesUserName},'%')
and bm.material_code like CONCAT('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and bs.supplier_name like CONCAT('%',#{supplierName},'%')
and bpm.product_model_code like CONCAT('%',#{productModelCode},'%')
GROUP BY oso.sales_user_name,bs.supplier_id,bm.material_id

SELECT oso.sales_user_name 'salesUserName',bs.region_name 'regionName',bs.country_name 'countryName',bs.supplier_id 'supplierId',bs.supplier_name 'supplierName', bmt.brand_name 'brandName',bmt.product_category 'productCategory',bpm.product_model_code 'productModelCode',bm.material_id 'materialId',bm.material_code 'materialCode', bm.material_desc 'materialDesc',sum(wijod.actual_qty) 'qty',wijod.work_end_time 'outDate' FROM wms_inner_job_order_det wijod LEFT JOIN wms_inner_job_order wijo ON wijod.job_order_id = wijo.job_order_id LEFT JOIN wms_out_delivery_order_det wodod ON wijod.source_det_id = wodod.delivery_order_det_id LEFT JOIN wms_out_delivery_order wodo ON wodod.delivery_order_id = wodo.delivery_order_id LEFT JOIN om_sales_order oso ON wodod.source_order_id = oso.sales_order_id AND wodo.order_type_id=1 LEFT JOIN base_supplier bs ON oso.supplier_id = bs.supplier_id LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON wijod.material_id = bm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_material_tab bmt ON bm.material_id = bmt.material_id LEFT JOIN base_product_model bpm ON bmt.product_model_id = bpm.product_model_id
wijod.actual_qty>0 AND wijo.job_order_type=4 AND wijod.order_status=6
and DATE_FORMAT(wijod.work_end_time,'%y%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%y%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%y%m')
and DATE_FORMAT(wijod.work_end_time,'%y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%y%m')
AND wijod.org_id=#{orgId}
and oso.sales_user_name like CONCAT('%',#{salesUserName},'%')
and bm.material_code like CONCAT('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and bs.supplier_name like CONCAT('%',#{supplierName},'%')
and bpm.product_model_code like CONCAT('%',#{productModelCode},'%')
GROUP BY oso.sales_user_name,bs.supplier_id,bm.material_id
